cd_name: Shortage of agricultural inputs (e.g., labor, improved seeds), farm equipment)
Long distance to agricultural input markets
Limited access to farming land/small land size
Unfavorable weather condition (e.g., excessive rain, untimely rain, excessive cold, excessive heat
Limited access to veterinary service and medications
Conflict over land , water, and other resources
Adjust input use (e.g., seeds and fertilizer) to conditions
Hire transport (alone or as a group)
